snippet: John C. McGinley, whose previous credits include the NBC comedy “Scrubs” and Oliver Stone’s Vietnam War drama “Platoon,” will play the embittered real-estate salesman Dave Moss.
abstract: John C. McGinley, whose previous credits include the NBC comedy “Scrubs” and Oliver Stone’s Vietnam War drama “Platoon,” will play the embittered real-estate salesman Dave Moss.

headline.main: John C. McGinley Joins 'Glengarry Glen Ross' Revival on Broadway
